column4: Hi again, it has been another 1/2 hour or so, and I am repeating, with an update:

Repeat #2: Problem: IDE (working) partitions not visible after Gutsy net-upgrade to Hardy on SATA  Note: those IDEs still show in BIOS, but NOT in partition manager ! see update after "sudo fdisk -l"  Paste: http://pastebin.com/m4175c259
Flannel suggested that they SHOULD be mapped as SATA
all drives are considered scsi now
